scope.title: Scope
scope.description: These Terms of Service apply to the use of the Relengo platform, operated by [Your Name/Company]. Relengo is a peer-to-peer rental marketplace for consumer goods and equipment.

registration.title: Registration
registration.clause1: 2.1 Using the platform requires registration. By registering, you confirm that you are at least 18 years old.
registration.clause2: 2.2 You agree to provide truthful and complete information and keep it up to date.

services.title: Services
services.clause1: 3.1 Relengo provides a platform through which users can offer and rent items.
services.clause2: 3.2 Relengo is not a party to the rental contracts between lenders and renters. The rental contract is exclusively between users.
services.clause3: 3.3 Relengo provides insurance coverage for rented items during the rental period.

lenders.title: Lenders
lenders.item1: Must be the owner or have the right to rent out the offered items
lenders.item2: Must provide accurate descriptions and photos
lenders.item3: Are liable for defects and damage to the rented item

renters.title: Renters
renters.item1: Must handle rented items with care
renters.item2: Are liable for damage during the rental period

payment.title: Payment and Fees
payment.clause1: 5.1 Payment is made through the platform. Relengo retains a service fee of [X%].
payment.clause2: 5.2 Payout to lenders occurs after completion of the rental and return of the item.

insurance.title: Insurance
insurance.description: Relengo provides insurance coverage for all items rented through the platform. Details about insurance can be found in our insurance terms.

liability.title: Liability
liability.clause1: 7.1 Relengo is not liable for damages arising from rental contracts between users.
liability.clause2: 7.2 Relengo is only liable for intent and gross negligence, except for breach of essential contractual obligations.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: Either party may terminate use of the platform at any time. Ongoing rental contracts remain unaffected.

law.title: Applicable Law
law.description: German law applies, excluding the UN Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods.
